content: **lumi bandana** ------------ the lumi bandana is where cozy comfort meets light this pattern started with a simple idea combine cute comfortable bandana for my dog with the essential safety of reflective gear the result is a simple triangular bandana that provides both warmth and visibility designed as a fast simple satisfying stash-buster the lumi bandana allows you to use up your favorite yarn scraps and simply combine them with a reflective yarn it s a perfect quick knit project that is cozy and fun for your furry friends you will knit the bandana flat from the top down with increases worked every other row until you reach your desired length and width you will bind-off with stretch bind off for comfortable to tie around the neck with easy size adjustments the lumi bandana is a practical accessory for dogs kids and even yourself it s quick to make easy to wear and provides light when you need it most **sizes ** one size and adjustable **finished sizes ** 30x 48 cm length x width **materials ** 90 to 200 m of dk stash yarn 1 to 2 skein of reflective yarn pattern used prym reflect yarn 1skein = 50m **gauge ** 18 sts x 24 row = 10 x 10 cm stockinette stitch on us 6 4 0 mm needle **needle sizes ** us 6 4 0 mm needle **notions ** tapestry needle
